name: Connectiles (hai!touch Studios)
description:
Also playable on Gotm.io!

Synopsis

Connect 4 blocks of the same color to pop them!

Made for Gotm Jam #5 “Make It Random. 5th place of 11 entries.

Controls
  • 1, 2: rotate
  • Left, Right: move
  • Down: soft drop
  • Up: hard drop
  • 3: enable debug menu
Detailed rules

Pieces consisting of connected blocks fall from the top of the board.

Connect 4 blocks in any shape to clear them. Longer chain reactions give you more progress towards your goal.

When you beat a level by passing the goal, all the blocks disconnect!

Survive as long as you can while the game speeds up and the levels get harder to beat.
